Host: example.com
Authorization: Owner
Content-Type: application/json
Content-Length: 242

{
  "operationName": null,
  "query": "\nmutation {\n  createDog(input: {\n    birthDate: \"1970-01-01T00:00:00Z\",\n    name: \"Lola\",\n    breed: CHIHUAHUA\n  }) {\n    id, name, breed, birthDate, owner { id }\n  }\n}",
